hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Musa:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "An honest treasurer who gives what he is ordered to give fully, perfectly and willingly to the person to whom he is ordered to give, is regarded as one of the two charitable persons

chapter.ara-name: باب وَكَالَةِ الأَمِينِ فِي الْخِزَانَةِ وَنَحْوِهَا
